item.description:
It's fall and time for medieval fun! I'm going to King Richard's faire Sun, Oct 17th, if anybody would like to join me.

Facing the ticket booths, we'll meet on the right side at 11:30am, Oct 17th until 11:45am. I'll have a handmade meetup sign and I'll be wearing a green t-shirt. If you get there late, you can text me @ 978-771-1322 for the group's location. Plz note that I WILL NOT be answering calls because of the live shows going on, so be sure to text me only.

Bring cash & ID for food, ale and games. Wear comfy walking shoes. We'll be sitting on the grass for the joust, so grass friendly clothes as well! Many people dress in costume, so if you want to dress as a wench or knight, go right ahead.

http://kingrichardsfa...

See you there!
~ Amy

Location:
235 Main St,
Carver, MA 02330
508-866-5391

Cost - $26 - tickets at gate must be paid in cash or buy online
item.name: King Richard's Faire, Oct 17th
